alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Lucie and east central Okeechobee Counties through 400 PM EST... At 330 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower 8 miles north of Four Seasons Estates, or 8 miles north of Okeechobee, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Country Hills Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
